languages.text: Маражай предполагает, что здесь выжившие бойцы Опустошительной бури могли вступить в бой с преследователями из других кабалов, жаждущих их смерти. Ксенос намерен высадиться на планете, чтобы втретиться с друкари из своего кабала — или бесцеремонно вторгнуться в сражение, кем бы ни оказались противники. Ксенос требует, чтобы лучшие бойцы Лорд-капитана отправились вместе с ним.

traits.locale_text: Маражай предполагает, что здесь выжившие бойцы Опустошительной бури могли вступить в бой с преследователями из других кабалов, жаждущих их смерти. Ксенос намерен высадиться на планете, чтобы помочь друкари из своего кабала, или бесцеремонно вторгнуться в сражение, кем бы ни оказались противники. Ксенос требует, чтобы лучшие бойцы Лорд-капитана отправились вместе с ним.

languages.text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.
languages.original_text: Маражай предполагает, что здесь выжившие бойцы Опустошительной бури могли вступить в бой с преследователями из других кабалов, жаждущих их смерти. Ксенос намерен высадиться на планете, чтобы втретиться с друкари из своего кабала — или бесцеремонно вторгнуться в сражение, кем бы ни оказались противники. Ксенос требует, чтобы лучшие бойцы Лорд-капитана отправились вместе с ним.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from other kabals, thirsting for their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

languages.text: 玛拉斋认为，在这片发生冲突的双方应该是狂风阴谋团幸存的战士，与另一个正在追杀他们的阴谋团。玛拉斋打算登上这颗行星，与他的阴谋团的伙伴会面，或是干脆蛮横地闯入战斗，不分敌我地乱杀一通。玛拉斋要求领主舰长派出最优秀的战士，与他一起参加战斗。
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋认为，在这片发生冲突的双方应该是狂风阴谋团幸存的战士，与另一个正在追杀他们的阴谋团。玛拉斋打算登上这颗行星，与他的阴谋团的伙伴会面，或是干脆蛮横地闯入战斗，不分敌我地乱杀一通。玛拉斋要求领主舰长派出最优秀的战士，与他一起参加战斗。

languages.text: リーヴィング・テンペストの生き残りの戦士たちは、この場所で、彼らの死を切望する他の陰謀団の追っ手と交戦するだろうと、マラズハイは推測している。異種族は惑星に着陸し、彼の陰謀団のデュカーリと会うつもりだ…あるいは、敵が誰であろうと無遠慮に戦いに割り込もうと考えている。異種族は、ロード・キャプテンの精鋭たちを連れて来るよう要求してきた。
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

traits.locale_text: リーヴィング・テンペストの生き残りの戦士たちは、この場所で、彼らの死を切望する他の陰謀団の追っ手と交戦するだろうと、マラズハイは推測している。異種族は惑星に着陸し、彼の陰謀団のデュカーリと会うつもりだ…あるいは、敵が誰であろうと無遠慮に戦いに割り込もうと考えている。異種族は、ロード・キャプテンの精鋭たちを連れて来るよう要求してきた。

languages.text: Marazhai cree que en este lugar los guerreros supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora podrían enfrentarse a los perseguidores de las otras Kábalas que ansían su muerte. El xenos quiere aterrizar en el planeta y reunirse con los Drukhari de su Kábala, o irrumpir sin miramientos en la batalla, sean quienes sean los enemigos. El xenos exige que los mejores guerreros {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán le acompañen.
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai cree que en este lugar los guerreros supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora podrían enfrentarse a los perseguidores de las otras Kábalas que ansían su muerte. El xenos quiere aterrizar en el planeta y reunirse con los Drukhari de su Kábala, o irrumpir sin miramientos en la batalla, sean quienes sean los enemigos. El xenos exige que los mejores guerreros {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán le acompañen.

languages.text: Marazhai nimmt an, dass hier die überlebenden Krieger des plündernden Sturms gegen ihre Verfolger von anderen Kabalen kämpfen, die sie auslöschen wollen. Der Xenos ist entschlossen, auf dem Planeten zu landen und sich mit den Drukhari seiner Kabale zu treffen — oder einfach wild in die Schlacht zu stürmen, wer auch immer der Feind sein mag. Der Xenos verlangt, dass der Lord Captain seine besten Krieger mitschickt.
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai nimmt an, dass hier die überlebenden Krieger des plündernden Sturms gegen ihre Verfolger von anderen Kabalen kämpfen, die sie auslöschen wollen. Der Xenos ist entschlossen, auf dem Planeten zu landen und sich mit den Drukhari seiner Kabale zu treffen — oder einfach wild in die Schlacht zu stürmen, wer auch immer der Feind sein mag. Der Xenos verlangt, dass der Lord Captain seine besten Krieger mitschickt.

languages.text: À en croire Marazhai, il s'agit probablement des survivants de la Tempête ravageuse, aux prises avec leurs poursuivants des autres kabales qui cherchent à les éliminer. Le xénos insiste pour se poser sur la planète afin d'aller à la rencontre des siens ou, à défaut, de se jeter sans cérémonie dans la bataille, quelle que soit l'identité des guerriers adverses. Il exige que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} l'envoie sur place avec ses meilleurs guerriers.
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.

traits.locale_text: À en croire Marazhai, il s'agit probablement des survivants de la Tempête ravageuse, aux prises avec leurs poursuivants des autres kabales qui cherchent à les éliminer. Le xénos insiste pour se poser sur la planète afin d'aller à la rencontre des siens ou, à défaut, de se jeter sans cérémonie dans la bataille, quelle que soit l'identité des guerriers adverses. Il exige que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} l'envoie sur place avec ses meilleurs guerriers.

languages.text: Marazhai, sağ kalan Müfteris Kasırga savaşçılarının ölümlerini arzulayan diğer Kaballardan gelen takipçileriyle burada çarpışmış olabileceğini düşünüyor. Zeno, gezegene inip Kabal mensubu Drukharilerle görüşmeye veya düşmanın kim olduğu fark etmeksizin çarpışmaya kararlı. Zeno, Lord Kaptan'ın en iyi savaşçılarının kendisiyle birlikte yollanmasını talep ediyor.
languages.original_text: Marazhai supposes that in this location the surviving warriors of the Reaving Tempest could engage their pursuers from the other Kabals that crave their deaths. The xenos is determined to land on the planet and meet with the Drukhari from his Kabal — or unceremoniously barge into the battle, whoever the enemies may be. The xenos demands that the Lord Captain's best warriors set out with him.
